'''''Middle English <nowiki>'</nowiki>Losenger<nowiki>'</nowiki>: Sketch of an etymological and semantic enquiry''''' is an offprint of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s essay "[[Middle English 'Losenger']]" from ''[[Essais de philologie moderne (1951)]]''.<ref>''An Illustrated Tolkien Bibliography'', at Tolkienbooks.net</ref><ref>[[Wayne G. Hammond]] and [[Christina Scull]], ''[[The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide]]: Reader's Guide'' (2006), p. 586</ref>
